item.title: ::yell
item.dc:creator: @ctash18 ctash18
item.description:
@ctash18 wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:4, topic:397952”]My one for delta.

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
if (muted)
return;
String titles = “”;
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = “[Player]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = “[Player]-”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = “[Donator]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = “[Moderator]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = “[Admin]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = “[CO-OWNER]-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“PLAYERSNAMEHERE”)) {
titles = “[CUSTOM YELL TITLE HERE]]-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURNAME”)) {
titles = “[OWNER&CODER]-”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));
    }

[/code][/quote]
Thank you very much sir. i like this better than mine anyway. Do you perhaps know how to make the titles colored?

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

My one for delta.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
if (muted)
    return;
String titles = "";
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = "[Player]-";
} 
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = "[Player]-";
}
 if (donator == 1) {
 titles = "[Donator]-";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator]-";
} 
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin]-";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[CO-OWNER]-";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERSNAMEHERE")) {
titles = "[CUSTOM YELL TITLE HERE]]-";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME")) {
titles = "[OWNER&CODER]-";
}
yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

Read full topic
